summary: Comprehensive testing of StartupManager Pro completed. Backend: 96.6% success (28/29 tests). Frontend: All pages working correctly including POS (previously reported as broken). MongoDB persistence verified. Payment endpoints (SIMULATED) working. Export endpoints working. AI integration working (except contract generation timeout).

minor.issue: AI contract generation times out after 30 seconds
minor.note: AI processing time exceeds timeout - not a critical system failure, other AI endpoints work

backend: API root endpoint - returns MongoDB status
Products CRUD - create, read, update, delete with MongoDB persistence
Employees CRUD - create, read, update, delete with MongoDB persistence
Sales - creation and persistence in MongoDB
frontend: Access gate page - email verification flow
Login page - authentication with demo credentials
Dashboard - stats, AI insights, charts, recent sales
Products page - list with 8 products, search, add/edit/delete buttons
Stock page - inventory with 8 lots, QR code generation
Employees page - list with 4 employees, contract types, salaries
POS page - product cards, shopping cart, payment button (FIXED from previous iteration)
Finances page - balances, revenue chart, pie chart, transaction history
Marketing IA page - product ad and job offer forms
RH IA page - employee selector, contract/attestation generation
Help Center page - guides, AI assistant chat

action_items: OPTIONAL: Increase timeout for AI contract generation endpoint or optimize AI processing
critical_code_review_comments: MongoDB _id properly excluded from responses using serialize_doc helper
All CRUD operations properly persist to MongoDB
Payment endpoints clearly marked as SIMULATED in responses
Access control system working with email-based authorization
seed_data_creation: Demo data auto-initialized on startup: 1 shop, 8 products, 8 batches, 4 employees, 3 accounts (cash, orange_money, bank)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. POS page navigation issue from iteration_1 is FIXED. AI contract generation has timeout issue but other AI features work. Payment and receipt endpoints are SIMULATED (not connected to real APIs). MongoDB persistence verified for products, employees, and sales.

mocked_apis.Orange Money payments: SIMULATED - returns fake transaction IDs starting with OM-
mocked_apis.Card payments: SIMULATED - returns fake transaction IDs starting with CARD-
mocked_apis.Cash payments: SIMULATED - returns fake transaction IDs starting with CASH-
mocked_apis.WhatsApp receipts: SIMULATED - not actually sent, returns message_id
mocked_apis.SMS receipts: SIMULATED - not actually sent, returns receipt preview

improvements_from_previous_iteration: POS page now accessible and working (was redirecting to dashboard in iteration_1)
AI endpoints working (were timing out in iteration_1)
Orange Money payment endpoint working (was timing out in iteration_1)
